newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech c.bank 1-week repo ave yield 44.98 pct.
newsitem.headline: Czech c.bank 1-week repo ave yield 44.98 pct.

text.p: The average yield in Monday's Czech National Bank (CNB) one-week repo tender fell to 44.98 percent, after 73.76 percent in a similar tender last week, the CNB said.
The central bank said all bids were accepted at the limit yield of 45 percent.
The central bank has been repeatedly holding reverse repo tenders in order to drain liquidity from the market and help the crown currency to resist a two-week long wave of short-selling.
